content.description: Start on the pocket sprag which is the shared start of Cosmic Thang, Zenith, Steel Wheels, Gauntlet, and Wrath. Dyno to the flake and move straight up through the light grey streak. Hard start on pockets with an easier finish on jugs.
content.location: 4th route from the left, follow the most obvious bolt line straight up.

content.description: Pull a huge move off the ground from a massive jug to a good pocket, then move through worse pockets, dealing with a difficult clip for bolt 2 before reaching some better holds. However, getting better holds means making bigger moves, be prepared to go big off every jug.
content.location: 2nd route on the left. Just right of Hyperactive.

content.description:
If you've never cared for manufactured routes this one might change your mind. Start with a dyno to a jug pocket, then boulder your way through drilled pockets on an otherwise blank face to gain a few natural features, including the asthetic Dragonfly feature which offers the only rest on this route. After resting pull difficult moves on monos and two finger pockets through a very hard ending. 

  This route will test your mono strength like no other!
content.location: Look for the first boltline to the right of pocket sprag. This is the only line that goes up through the obvious Dragonfly feature.

content.description: Climb through 1, 2, and 3 finger pockets up to a large cave, climbing the left hand side up to the anchors.
content.location: Left most route on the main overhang, look for the obvious cave.

content.description: Steep, hard, pocket pulling is the name of the game at this wall. The warmup, which clocks in at 11c includes several monos and two-finger pockets, and most of the routes here fall into the 5.12 - 5.13 range. However, there is room for MUCH more development here, and there is potential for this place to include a multitude of easier routes for climbers of all skill levels. For now, if you come to this wall expect sandbagged grades, but rewarding gymnastic climbing on a spectacular wall.
